description: Our plant based bioplastic cover let's you protect your iPod Touch from scratches and impact in style while protecting the environment with reduced carbon footprint and no toxins. If you're one of those who loves gaming on iPod Touch, our non-toxic bioplastic cover is for you as it prevents potential skin irritation during long gaming sessions. The patent pending feet discreetly placed on the sides and top of iPod Touch cover protect the screen from scratches during face down placement on flat surfaces.
title: Bioserie Bioplastic Cover for iPod touch 4G (White)
